featured.text: Bobby cared a lot about his _____ at home and asked his parents not to go through his things without his permission.

definition.zh_def: 一種圓形的髮夾，通常用來固定頭髮。
definition.en_def: A type of hairpin, usually round, used to secure hair.
definition.example: She used a bobby pin to keep her hair in place.
